short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a random bookmark whenever you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're anything like me, you've amassed a crazy amount of bookmarks over the years! This extension makes it so that every time you open a new tab you get a random bookmark from your collection. You can set the frequency of the update to change daily, weekly, or every time.
